comment.body:
> [p2p](#comment_81_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): After win & mac Easier ZeroNet installation, I think we need to work on Android Easier ZeroNet installation, the goal of it should be a user-friendly APK released on Google Play.I request creating a ZeroNet-kivy repo so that we can discuss & work on it together.Kivy is a cross-platform framework, not only Android but also iOS, even desktop (win, linux, mac ). Anyone interested in iOS dev can also work on it.

Is there a way to run Zeronet on Android? I'm still new to this sorry.
